messages.body:
In a message dated 6/12/2013, tamas1@EUnet.rs writes:


Dear Friend,


The first $5,000.00 was sent today. our working partners has helped us to send
the first $5,000.00 to you through western union. So contact our Western Union
claims Agent to pick up this $5,000 now: Contact person:  Pastor Benjoes C.
john, E-mail: westernnoneyclaim@outlook.com Ask them to give you the MTCN,
Sender Name to pick the $5,000.00. we told them to keep sending you $5,000.00
daily until the payment of $1.500,000.00 is completed. Again forward him your
details,so that he will be sure.


Fill The Form Below


1. Name:______
2. Address________
3. Country:_______
4. Phone Number____
5. Occupation:________
6. Sex:_________________
7. Age___________________
Thanks.


Customer Service
Western Union Office 2013®
messages.raw:
'WESTERN UNION'

messages.body: No, thank you.  I never do business with people who are called "Pastor".  I find them universally deceitful.
messages.raw:
LEX TALIONIS

Date: Wed, 12 Jun 2013

No, thank you. I never do business with people who are called "Pastor". I find them universally deceitful.

messages.body:
westernnoneyclaim@outlook.com
 6/24/2013


WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER
Welcome to Western Union Send Money Worldwide
FOREIGN CONTRACTOR PAYMENT OFFICE
TELEPHONE: +234-703-897-7614


Attention: 


It saddens my heart a great deal when people from you country take every thing that is from here as a hoax. My dear i will not blame you, you have the right to believe so because some people from my country here have made it look like everything is now hoax. My Good friend i was so shocked when i can back form my vacation and find out that your check is still here on my desk. Please get back to me and let me see how i can help you receive your fund.


I know why you dont want to make this payment for your fund to be transferred the reason is simple, we are from Africa, and so for that you don't feel comfortable doing anything with us. You are one of those people who think that you don't have to touch anybody from here with the longest pole. But I want you to know that it is too bad for you to think that way too ,we know that  people from here has made a lot of millionaires out of people in Europe and America, though it is a pity that we got to know about all this very late. i also want to let you know that Life its self is all about trials and risk. Give this trial, you will never regret you did. I also want to let you know that we are a VERY rich country but with a VERY bad government, in this situation that's why people take us to be bad, but be rest assured that there is no risk involved in this, we work with the government and therefore are not permitted to do any form  illegal business while in office.


I advise you make your payment and have your fund released to you without anymore delay from us.


Do this unfailingly, we will have your released to you and your fund transferred to you on or before 12: pm your time tomorrow, I guarantee you that.


Your urgent respond is highly needed to enable us to release your first transferred $5,000 within an hour, include your telephone number as you reply with your payment MTCN for the transfer fees. We hereby issued you our code of conduct, which is (WUMT-824), call me for any question +234-703-897-7614


Await your response.


Regards
Pst. Ben C john (Transfer Manager)
Forign Operation Manager
Western Union Lagotes Pala
messages.raw:
BEN JOHN

messages.body: I'm not very worried about your emotional state.  I don't take everything that comes from Nigeria as a hoax, just things like the one you're sending me.
messages.raw:
LEX TALIONIS

messages.body:
There is no God.  We live in a random universe governed by probability and we make up these gods because we can't face our own fleeting, momentary lives. 





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*

LEX TALIONIS

Sent: 6/24/2013

There is no God. We live in a random universe governed by probability and we make up these gods because we can't face our own fleeting, momentary lives.

This was apparently too crushing a blow to "Ben John's" world view.
